RINGTONE WORKSHOP

20.05 - 19:00-21:00

AREBYTE BETHNAL GREEN, 62 ROMAN ROAD, E2 0PG

all you need is a snack, a computer and a dream

this workshop is open to anyone! we'll be sharing snacks and making ringtones for a new piece in collaboration with the Peckham Chamber Orchestra

____________________

London Community Laptop Orchestra

we are a community based laptop orchestra, open to anyone who's interested. no experience required. only a laptop.
